kiyala.mama akkata wiriththala "mama iridata yanawa" kiyala thirane sabhagatha kara.eekamathikawa thirane sammatha wuna.irida ude ee kiyanne nowambar 6 wenida makuluwa dadibidi gala lasthiwela subhamohothin maha wasse geyin eliyata bahala sinama shalawa kara gaman arambauwa.rupiyal 20katath kelawagena bas ekaka nagala gihin sinama shalawa langin bahagaththa.me sinama shalawa kanda udarata paththe tharamak prasiddha thanak.pihitala thiyenne mahawali gan iwure(dannam danna aayo dannawa thana mokakda kiyala..)kohoma hari pare indala balana kota katawut gahana bod lalla apuruwata penawa.mamath ithin athulata yanna kalin thahawuru karagaththa mokakda penwana pichar eka kiyala.bod lallata anuwa nam "ira handa yata" thamayi.onna ithin mamath gettuwen athulata giya.athulata giyata film eka balanna balu ballekwath na wage.yabada sinama shalawata nam sahena polimak thiyenawa(bahutharayak hitiye athuluta gihin rangapana kattiya....).makuluwata tikak aspat giya.mata theruna mokak hari kes ekak mata fayil wela wage kiyala.mala thoppiyayi!nayi kayida ros pan kiwuwalu.menna bole sinama shalawe udin gahala thiyena katawut ekata amatharawa athulwena doreth thawa abiththan katawut ekak gahala thiyenawa.makulu dethun parak as pihadalath baluwa meka aththama ekak da kiyala.mokak da dannawada gahala thibbe."aluth wadiya katayuthu sandaha sinama shalawa wasa atha.nawatha wiwrutha kirima - nowambar masa 10wana dina..."mata ambanaka flawar jampin....deparak hithuwe na,pichar hol eke lokuthana athulu pawule samata hembirissawa hadewwa.monawa karannada?dawasama hitiyath meka dan aapahu pennayi kiyalaya.giya gonkamata aapahu harila aawa.gedara aapu gaman ithin akkage nondiya kanna wuna.nondi kama nam awulak na kiyamuko.dan mata thiyena prashne thama mama karapu gon wade mokakda kiyana eka. 1.chithrapataya balanna noya sitima.... 2.awasana mohothe ho chithrapataya balanna yama....no.1 nam ithin wadi chanden gonkamak widihata wargikaranaya karanna puluwana.no.2???????????????mama hithana widihata eeka nam gonkamak neme.mokada sinamashala ayithikarayage wagakima thama prasiddha karalathiyena anthima dawasa dakwa chithrapataya pradarshanaya kirima.(pennan na kiyana danwimawath penna gahala thiyapiyako...ehemawath nane.)ethakota mehema siddhiyak wenawanam mama wage awasana mohothe hari film eka balanna ena prekshakayanta mokada wenne.mehema siddhiwalin sinhala sinamawata wenne barapathala haniyakda?nadda?kiyana eka hithala balana eka oyagollanta ayithi wadak.mokada?oya dekayi panahe sinhala chithrapata(rosa kale,suwanda danuna jiwithe,....)wage wanijathwaya pamanak padanam karagaththa chithrapatayak penwanakota kawadakawath ohoma siddhiyak wuna kiyala kohediwath aaranchiwela nam na.eka athakata mewage siddhiwalata hethuwa prekshakayage pirihima wennath puluwan.samanyayen wenne "ira handa yata" wage chithrapatayak aapu alutha unu kawum wage alewi wunata pahu pahu wenakota kohu kohu wenawa.mekata hethuwa
me parath paradewa kiyalayi mama nam hadawathinma pathanne (asahana karayo thamayi meyalawa adahanne)
